title: The Best Soda Makers in 2022 for Efficient Effervescence
sub_head: Home seltzer makers are all the rage again. We tested four newer models that are giving the classic SodaStream brand a bubbly run for the money.
body:
IF YOU WANT to sip something healthier than sugar-laced soda, seltzer is decidedly livelier than plain water. But schlepping seltzer home from the supermarket is decidedly a drag. As we’ve known since SodaStream took off in the 2010s, home seltzer makers—with their reusable bottles—offer a convenient way to reduce both your waist and your waste, but some seltzer connoisseurs remain skeptical.
Though Alex Gomberg, vice president of delivery service Brooklyn Seltzer Boys, says homemade seltzer will never be as bubbly as what old-school siphon bottles showily spew, he offers tips: Always use filtered water and store carbonated beverages in glass, not plastic bottles. “We triple-filter our water,” he said, but a standard water filter should suffice for home bubblifiers.
